transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Boliye. Yes, Kiran Spices exports.
Hm, boliye. Hi, good morning. This is Pallavi from IndiaMART. How are you?
Boliye.
Okay, sir. Sir, you know, we need to have this, you know, online demonstration. So if you can come online just for five minutes, we can just brief you about the IndiaMART services that you have taken. We'll take just five minutes of yours.
Okay.
Okay. Video online.
Are you like sleeping, sir?
Hello?
Hello?
Okay, sir. Should I send you the link, sir?
Why?
Sir, I'm saying, should I send you the link for the discussion?
Yeah, you can send me.
Okay, okay, sir. So I'm sending you the link, sir. Please join.
Okay. Please open the registered email ID.
Okay.
Please check your email, sir. I'll send you the video meeting link.
The email ID I have is it starts from H, sir. I think it's Harikrishna@gmail.com.
I didn't get any link, sir.
Sorry?
I didn't get any link.
No, I'll send it on Harikrishna, sir. Please check your email, the Gmail ID. I have shared the this, sir.
You have shared through Gmail.
Yeah, yeah, yeah. I'll send it. Google Meet I'll send, sir. I'll send it on the Harikrishna@gmail.
Okay.
Let me know.
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Miru matladutunna vyakti, nee call nu hold lo uncharu. Dayachesi line lo vechi undandi.
Aap jis vyakti se baat
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive the meeting link.

Resolution:

- Executive resent the meeting link.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral
